== Trivia ==

* The skin pack is included as one of the default skin packs in [[Minecraft Education|''Minecraft Education'']], being usable in the demo version.<ref>{{YouTube link|NlrRiAok6E8|Minecraft Live 2021: Student Projects|Minecraft|October 23, 2021}}</ref>
* The key art for the map was used on the thumbnail for the [[Event servers|event]] [[Server Test]].
* Despite showing up in A Block and a Hard Place, there is no official Lukas Armored skin.
